ARABIC: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى قَتَلْتُ مِنْهُمْ نَفْسًا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, I killed one of them and I am afraid they will kill me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "O Lord, I have killed a man of theirs, and fear they would kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "My Lord, I have killed one person from among them, and I fear that they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Moses) said, "Lord, I have killed a man from their people and I am afraid that they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He submitted, “My Lord! I killed a soul among them and I fear they will kill me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! I have killed a man among them, and I fear that they will kill me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! surely I killed one of them, so I fear lest they should slay me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'My Lord, I have indeed slain a living soul among them, and I fear that they will slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Lo! I killed a man among them and I fear that they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "My Lord, I have killed one of their people and fear that they may kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: My Lord! verily I have slain a man among them and I fear they shall slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Indeed, I have killed one of their men, so I fear they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! I have slain a man among them, and I fear lest they slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! I have killed a man among them, and I fear that they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord' (said Moses), 'I have killed a living soul among them, and fear that they will slay me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, I have killed one of them, and I fear they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, indeed, I killed from among them someone, and I fear they will kill me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:33] He said, ‘My Lord, I have indeed slain a soul among them — the mentioned Egyptian — and so I fear that they will slay me, because of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Moses said: (My Lord! Lo! I killed a man among them and I fear that they will kill me) in retaliation.
